pages.text: $(bgreen)Hypno Shroom$() asserts that Zombies are our friends, and they are badly misunderstood creatures who play a valuable role in our ecology. We should do more to bring them round to our way of thinking.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)passive$() plant that works when $(l)eaten by equal or lower level zombie$(), and hypno it as yours.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() The one who ate it will be removed and it will $(bred)summon a gargantuar$() to help you.
